DOC.brief_summary: In randomize , double-blind , placebo-controlled trial plan enrol 200 vitamin D deficient hypertensive patient . Our main objective evaluate whether vitamin D3 supplementation 2,800 IU daily 8 week effect 24-hour systolic ambulatory blood pressure ( ABP ) compare placebo . In addition , also aim evaluate whether vitamin D3 supplementation alters 24-hour diastolic ABP , pulse wave velocity , N-terminal-pro-brain natriuretic peptide ( NT-pro-BNP ) , correct QT interval ( Bazett formula ) , renin , aldosterone , 24-hour urinary albumin excretion , HOMA-IR ( HOmeostatic Model Assessment : Insulin Resistance ) , triglycerides HDL-cholesterol .
